allow: Bash(for file in login.html Home.html PropertyInfo.html WinterOpsLog.html EquipmentUsageReport.html ManageUsers.html Reports.html ViewWinterLogs.html ViewGreenLogs.html GreenOpsLog.html ManageEquipmentRates.html ManageWinterProducts.html ManageLandscapeProducts.html signup.html)
Bash(for file in ViewWinterLogs.html ViewGreenLogs.html ManageWinterProducts.html ManageLandscapeProducts.html signup.html pending-approval.html ApprovePendingUsers.html)

Bash(for file in AdminDashboard.html ManagerDashboard.html UserDashboard.html login.html Home.html WinterOpsLog.html PropertyInfo.html ManageUsers.html Reports.html EquipmentUsageReport.html GreenOpsLog.html ManageEquipmentRates.html ViewWinterLogs.html ViewGreenLogs.html ManageWinterProducts.html ManageLandscapeProducts.html signup.html pending-approval.html ApprovePendingUsers.html)

Bash(then sed -i 's|<link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""/static/mobile-responsive.css"">|<link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""/static/mobile-responsive.css"">\n    <link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""/static/modern-theme.css"">|' "$file")

Bash(for file in AdminDashboard.html Home.html PropertyInfo.html WinterOpsLog.html EquipmentUsageReport.html ManageUsers.html Reports.html ViewWinterLogs.html ViewGreenLogs.html GreenOpsLog.html ManageEquipmentRates.html ManageWinterProducts.html ManageLandscapeProducts.html signup.html pending-approval.html ApprovePendingUsers.html)

Bash(for file in login.html AdminDashboard.html Home.html PropertyInfo.html WinterOpsLog.html EquipmentUsageReport.html ManageUsers.html Reports.html ManageEquipmentRates.html ManageWinterProducts.html ManageLandscapeProducts.html signup.html ApprovePendingUsers.html ManagerDashboard.html UserDashboard.html PropertyBoard.html)
